title: The First Anne of Green Gables Omnibus
description: THREE AVONLEA BOOKS IN E-BOOK FORM FOR ONE LOW PRICE! Here are the first three books in the beloved, heart-warming adventures of Anne. Travel back in time to Green Gables and Avonlea and the company of one of the most delightful heroines in literary history. In this omnibus e-book edition you will find Anne of Green Gables, Anne or Avonlea and Chronicles of Avonlea - complete and unabridged. Millions learned to love her through L. M. Montgomery's fabulous books, and millions more fell under her spell while watching the long-running PBS series. Here is your chance read or reread these three books for one low price!
author: L.M. Montgomery
